text:
Seems like #chloroquine 💊 entering the mainstream now as a potential treatment for #COVID19 

Along with good data coming out on #remdesivir and full clinical trial data due April 3, this is some* good news IMO for North America 🇨🇦 🇺🇸

*we need more data, but it's promising! https://t.co/F3AFuqRgRp
